description: This file defines a React component called LiveSearch, which provides a debounced search input for querying a backend service (searchConnector) based on a specific connectorId ('jira' or 'confluence'). It includes functions for normalizing raw search results and manages search state, loading indicators, and error handling.

methods.name: isRecord
methods.description: Type guard to check if a value is a record (object with string keys).

methods.name: toArray
methods.description: Converts a value into an array of type T. Wraps non-array values into an array.

methods.name: asString
methods.description: Converts a value to a string if possible, or returns undefined.

methods.name: normalizeResults
methods.description: Normalizes raw search result data into an array of NormalizedResult objects.
